analysis.key_quote: My mother (and I) do NOT approve of the current occupant of the WH and their abuse of power, the so-called DOGE and Escam Muck along with basically all of trumps appointees.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses disapproval of the current administration and its appointees but does not directly address the proposed rule regarding Schedule F or civil service protections. Therefore, it does not clearly align with a stance for or against the rule.
